English Sentences: The word of the LORD that came unto Hosea, the son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooziyaani, Yo7aataami, Akaazinne Hizqqiyaasi kaalli kaallidi Yihudan kawotido wode, qassi Yo7aasha na7ai Iyorbbaami Israa7eelan kawotido wode, Bi7eera na7aa Hoose7akko yiida GODAA qaalai hagaa.

English Sentences: The beginning of the word of the LORD by Hosea. And the LORD said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI koiro Hoose7a baggaara haasayido wode, Hoose7a, "Ba; baada shaaramuxa maccaasiyo neeyyo ekka; ekkada shaaramuxeeppe naata yela. Aissi giikko, shaaramuxiya maccaasiyaa ba azinaappe shaahettiyoogaadan, ta asai taappe shaahettiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim; which conceived, and bare him a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin biidi, Dibilaima na7iyo Goomero ekkiis; ekkin shahaarada, attuma na7a au yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto him, Call his name Jezreel; for yet a little while, and I will avenge the blood of Jezreel upon the house of Jehu, and will cause to cease the kingdom of the house of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, GODAI Hoose7a, "Na7aa sunttaa Iziraa7eela yaagada suntta. Aissi giikko, Iziraa7eelan gukkida suuttaa autiyau taani Yeehu zareta qantta wodiyan achchana; Israa7eela kawotettaakka xaissana.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass at that day, that I will break the bow of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi taani Iziraa7eela Wombban Israa7eela olanchchata mentterettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she conceived again, and bare a daughter. And God said unto him, Call her name Loruhamah: for I will no more have mercy upon the house of Israel; but I will utterly take them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goomera naa77anttuwaa shahaarada, macca na7iyo yelaasu. Yaatin, GODAI Hoose7a, "I sunttaa Loruhaamo yaagada suntta. Aissi giikko, hagaappe sinttanau taani Israa7eela asau qarettikke; etau mulekka atto giikke.

English Sentences: But I will have mercy upon the house of Judah, and will save them by the LORD their God, and will not save them by bow, nor by sword, nor by battle, by horses, nor by horsemen.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Yihudaa asaassi qarettana; taani GODAN, eta Xoossan, eta ashshanaappe attin, wonddafiyan woikko bisuwan woikko olan woikko paratun woikko paraasatun ashshikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when she had weaned Loruhamah, she conceived, and bare a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goomera Loruhaamo xanttaa duuttidoogaappe guyyiyan, haranttuwaa shahaarada, attuma na7aa yelaasu.

English Sentences: Then said God, Call his name Loammi: for ye are not my people, and I will not be your God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, GODAI Hoose7a, "A sunttaa Lo7aama yaagada suntta. Aissi giikko, intte ta asa gidekketa; taanikka intte Xoossaa gidikke.

English Sentences: Yet the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured nor numbered; and it shall come to pass, that in the place where it was said unto them, Ye are not my people, there it shall be said unto them, Ye are the sons of the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asai makkanaunne qoodanau danddayettenna abbaa shafe keena gidana. Etau, Intte ta asa gidekketa geetetti odettidosan, Intte de7o Xoossaa naata geetettana.

English Sentences: Then shall the children of Judah and the children of Israel be gathered together, and appoint themselves one head, and they shall come up out of the land: for great shall be the day of Jezreel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asainne Israa7eela asai issippe shiiqana; shiiqidi banttau issi halaqaa doorana; dooridi omoodo biittaappe simmananne ishalidi de7ana. Aissi giikko, Iziraa7eela gallassai gita gallassa gidana.

English Sentences: Say ye unto your brethren, Ammi; and to your sisters, Ruhamah.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ishantta, GODAI inttena, "Ta asa" yaagees yaagite. Qassi intte michcheta, GODAI inttena, "Taani intteyyo qarettais" yaagees yaagite.

English Sentences: Plead with your mother, plead: for she is not my wife, neither am I her husband: let her therefore put away her whoredoms out of her sight, and her adulteries from between her breasts;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte aayyiyo zorite; o zorite. Aissi giikko, a ta machcho gidukku; taanikka i azina gidikke. A ba som77uwaa shaaramuxatto bessiyoogaa aggu; ba shaaramuxa oosuwaakka ba xanttatu gidduwaappe diggu.

English Sentences: Lest I strip her naked, and set her as in the day that she was born, and make her as a wilderness, and set her like a dry land, and slay her with thirst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee xayikko, a yelettido gallassaadan, taani o xiire kallo ashshana. Qassi melida bazzo biittaadan o oottana; taani o saamuwan worana.

English Sentences: And I will not have mercy upon her children; for they be the children of whoredoms.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti shaaramuxeeppe yelettida naata gidido gishshau, taani i naatussi qarettikke.

English Sentences: For their mother hath played the harlot: she that conceived them hath done shamefully: for she said, I will go after my lovers, that give me my bread and my water, my wool and my flax, mine oil and my drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aayyiyaa shaaramuxaasu; eta ba uluwan tookkidaara kaushshabaa hanaasu. Waanada giikko, a, Taani ta kattaanne ta haattaa, ta suufiyaanne ta liinuwaa, ta zaitiyaanne ta ushshaa taassi immiya ta laggettota kaallada baana yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, I will hedge up thy way with thorns, and make a wall, that she shall not find her paths.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani i ogiyaa agunttan gorddana; a ba loossuwaa demmenna mala, taani gimbbiyaa gimbbana.

English Sentences: And she shall follow after her lovers, but she shall not overtake them; and she shall seek them, but shall not find them: then shall she say, I will go and return to my first husband; for then was it better with me than now.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ba laggettotu geeduwaa woxxana, shin gakkukku; eta koyana, shin demmukku. Hegaappe guyyiyan a, Tau ha77i duussaappe beniigee kehiyo gishshau, simmada ta koiro azinaakko baana yaagana.

English Sentences: For she did not know that I gave her corn, and wine, and oil, and multiplied her silver and gold, which they prepared for Baal.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kattaa, woiniyaa eessaanne zaitiyaa iyyo immidaageenne eti Ba7aala giyo eeqau shiishshiyo biraanne worqqaa iyyo darissidaagee tana gidiyoogaa a erennan ixxaasu.

English Sentences: Therefore will I return, and take away my corn in the time thereof, and my wine in the season thereof, and will recover my wool and my flax given to cover her nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ka77iyo wode ta kattaa, qassi teeriyo wode ta woiniyaa taani ippe zaarada ekkana. Hegaadankka, i kalluwaa maizzanau, suufiyaappenne liinuwaappe dadettida maayuwaakka ippe qaara ekkana.

English Sentences: And now will I discover her lewdness in the sight of her lovers, and none shall deliver her out of mine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i laggettotu sinttan taani i kalluwaa bessana; ta kushiyaappe ooninne o ashshenna.

English Sentences: I will also cause all her mirth to cease, her feast days, her new moons, and her sabbaths, and all her solemn feasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani i ufaissai ubbai, i gibirai, i aginai xeeriyo gallassati, i Sambbata gallassati, laittan laittan bonchchettiya i baalati ubbai attanaadan, oottana.

English Sentences: And I will destroy her vines and her fig trees, whereof she hath said, These are my rewards that my lovers have given me: and I will make them a forest, and the beasts of the field shall eat them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akka, Ta laggettoti taayyo immido kerai hagaa yaagido i woiniyaa turatanne balase geetettiya mittata taani xaissana; taani eta wora oottana; oottin bazzo do7ati eta maana.

English Sentences: And I will visit upon her the days of Baalim, wherein she burned incense to them, and she decked herself with her earrings and her jewels, and she went after her lovers, and forgat me, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A tana dogada, ba laggettota kaallaidda, gutuchchatuuninne alleeqotun bau alleeqettaidda, Ba7aala giyo eeqaayyo ixaanaa cuwayido baala gallassatu gishshau, taani o qaxxayana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas.

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, I will allure her, and bring her into the wilderness, and speak comfortably unto her.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani o labada bazzo ehaana; ehaada taani iyyo siiqo qaalan odana.

English Sentences: And I will give her her vineyards from thence, and the valley of Achor for a door of hope: and she shall sing there, as in the days of her youth, and as in the day when she came up out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan taani i woiniyaa turaa sohuwaa iyyo zaarada immana; Metuwaa Wombbaakka a ufaissan naagiyoobai geliyo pengge oottana. Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido wodiyaadan, ba geela7otettaa laittaadan, a yan yexxana" yaagees.

English Sentences: And it shall be at that day, saith the LORD, that thou shalt call me Ishi; and shalt call me no more Baali.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "He gallassi a tana, Ta azinaa yaagada xeesanappe attin, hagaappe sinttanau, Ta Ba7aala yaagada xeesukku.

English Sentences: For I will take away the names of Baalim out of her mouth, and they shall no more be remembered by their name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani i doonaappe Ba7aalantta sunttaa diggana; hagaappe sinttanau taani o Ba7aala sunttaa xeesissikke.

English Sentences: And in that day will I make a covenant for them with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven, and with the creeping things of the ground: and I will break the bow and the sword and the battle out of the earth, and will make them to lie down safely.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi taani ta asaa gishshau sa7aa do7atuura, saluwaa kafotuuranne biittaara gooshettiya meretatuura maachchaa maacettana. Taani biittaappe wonddafiyaa, bisuwaanne olaa xaissana; yaatobare eti woppu giidi, saro de7ana.

English Sentences: And I will betroth thee unto me for ever; yea, I will betroth thee unto me in righteousness, and in judgment, and in lovingkindness, and in mercies.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani nena merinau taassi giigissana; giigissaidda xillotettaaninne suure pirddan, aggenna siiquwaaninne maarotan taassi giigissana;

English Sentences: I will even betroth thee unto me in faithfulness: and thou shalt know the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ammanettada nena taassi giigissana. Neenikka GODAA erana" yaagees.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass in that day, I will hear, saith the LORD, I will hear the heavens, and they shall hear the earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAI, "He gallassi taani zaaruwaa immana; taani salotussi zaaruwaa immin, eti sa7aassi zaaruwaa immana.

English Sentences: And the earth shall hear the corn, and the wine, and the oil; and they shall hear Jezreel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aikka kattau, woine eessaunne zaitiyau zaaruwaa immana; immin eti Iziraa7eelau zaaruwaa immana.

English Sentences: And I will sow her unto me in the earth; and I will have mercy upon her that had not obtained mercy; and I will say to them which were not my people, Thou art my people; and they shall say, Thou art my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani o biittan taassi zerana. Kase taani qarettabeennaarissi ha77i qarettana. Qassi ta asa gidennaageeta, Ta asa gaana; etikka tana, Neeni nu Xoossaa yaagana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Then said the LORD unto me, Go yet, love a woman beloved of her friend, yet an adulteress, according to the love of the LORD toward the children of Israel, who look to other gods, and love flagons of wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana, "Israa7eela asai hara xoossatukko simmidi, woiniyaa teeraa melaa lichchakkuwaa siiqishinkka GODAI eta siiqiyoogaadan, ba; baada laggettuwaa siiqada, shaaramuxaidda de7iya beni ne machchiyo neenikka zaarettada siiqa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So I bought her to me for fifteen pieces of silver, and for an homer of barley, and an half homer of barley:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin taani o tammanne ichchashu xaqara biraaninne xeetanne ishatamu kilo giraame deexxiya gisttiyan shammaas.

English Sentences: And I said unto her, Thou shalt abide for me many days; thou shalt not play the harlot, and thou shalt not be for another man: so will I also be for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHammada o, "Neeni shaaramuxennaaninne hara asaara de7ennan tanaara daro wodiyaa de7anau koshshees. Taanikka nenaara de7ana" yaagaas.

English Sentences: For the children of Israel shall abide many days without a king, and without a prince, and without a sacrifice, and without an image, and without an ephod, and without teraphim:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, Israa7eela asai kawoi woikko halaqai bainnan, yarshshoi woikko eeqa tuussi bainnaaninne eefuudiyaa giyo maayoi woikko so giddo eeqaa misilee bainnan daro wodiyaa de7ana.

English Sentences: Afterward shall the children of Israel return, and seek the LORD their God, and David their king; and shall fear the LORD and his goodness in the latter days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai simmidi, GODAA bantta Xoossaanne Daawita bantta kawuwaa koyana; koyidi wurssetta gallassatun eti kokkoriiddi, GODAAKKONNE a anjjuwaakko yaana.

English Sentences: Hear the word of the LORD, ye children of Israel: for the LORD hath a controversy with the inhabitants of the land, because there is no truth, nor mercy, nor knowledge of God in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, GODAA qaalaa siyite! Aissi giikko, ha biittan de7iya asaa ubbaa GODAI mootiyoobai de7ees. Hegeekka, ha biittan ammanoi, siiqoinne Xoossaa eriyoogee baawa.

English Sentences: By swearing, and lying, and killing, and stealing, and committing adultery, they break out, and blood toucheth blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha biittan de7iyaabai qanggetta, worddo, asa woro, wuussanne shaaramuxa xalaala. Eti maachcha ubbaa kanttidosona; asaa woroi woruwaa kaallees.

English Sentences: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gaasuwan biittai melana; biittan de7iya ubbai daafurana. Sa7aa do7atikka, saluwaa kafotikka, harai attin, abbaa moletikka haiqqana.

English Sentences: Yet let no man strive, nor reprove another: for thy people are as they that strive with the priest.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Inttenoo, qeesetoo, taani inttena mootiyoobai de7ees. Hegaa gishshau, ooninne hara asaara palamettoppo; qassi ooninne hara asa mootoppo.

English Sentences: Therefore shalt thou fall in the day, and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night, and I will destroy thy mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte gallassi xubettana; hananabaa yootiyaageetikka inttenaara qammi xubettana. Hegaa gishshau, taani intte aayyiyo xaissana.

English Sentences: My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge: because thou hast rejected knowledge, I will also reject thee, that thou shalt be no priest to me: seeing thou hast forgotten the law of thy God, I will also forget thy children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai eratettai xayin bayiis. Intte eratettaa ixxido gishshau, taanikka intte tau qeese gidanaagaa ixxais. Intte Xoossaa higgiyaa intte dogido gishshau, taanikka intte naata dogana.

English Sentences: As they were increased, so they sinned against me: therefore will I change their glory into shame.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qeeseti dari dari biido keenaa, tana darissi naaqqidosona; taanikka eta bonchchuwaa yeellau laammana.

English Sentences: They eat up the sin of my people, and they set their heart on their iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asaa nagarai etau quma gidiis; hegaa gishshau, eti ta asaa moorobaa ootissanau jaamoosona.

English Sentences: And there shall be, like people, like priest: and I will punish them for their ways, and reward them their doings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesetikka asai haniyoogaadan hanana. Taani eta hanotaa gishshau, eta qaxxayana; qassi eta oosuwaadan, etau zaarana.

English Sentences: For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAA aggido gishshau, maana, shin kallokkona; shaaramuxana, shin naata corayokkona.

English Sentences: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHaaramuxatettai, gam77ida woine eessainne yelaga woine eessai ta asaa wozanaa bashshees.

English Sentences: My people ask counsel at their stocks, and their staff declareth unto them: for the spirit of whoredoms hath caused them to err, and they have gone a whoring from under their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai mittaappe oosettida eeqa misiliyaa zoriyaa oichchees; eta gatimai eta oishaa zaarees. SHaaramuxa ayyaanai eta balettiis; eti bantta Xoossaappe shaahettidi shaaramuxidosona.

English Sentences: They sacrifice upon the tops of the mountains, and burn incense upon the hills, under oaks and poplars and elms, because the shadow thereof is good: therefore your daughters shall commit whoredom, and your spouses shall commit adultery.
Wolaitta Sentences: Deretu huuphiyan yarshshuwaa yarshshoosona; keratu bollankka kuwai lo77o gidiyo adussanne daashsha mittatu garssankka ixaanaa cuwayoosona. "Hegaa gishshau, intte macca naati shaaramuxa kiyoosona; intte naatu maccaasatikka shaaramuxoosona.

English Sentences: I will not punish your daughters when they commit whoredom, nor your spouses when they commit adultery: for themselves are separated with whores, and they sacrifice with harlots: therefore the people that doth not understand shall fall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte macca naati shaaramuxiyo wodenne intte naatu maccaasati shaaramuxiyo wode, taani qaxxayikke; aissi giikko, attuma asati bantta huuphiyan shaaramuxiyaageetuura zuppetoosona; shaaramuxiyaageetuura yarshshuwaa yarshshoosona. Hegaa gishshau, akeekai bainna asai aadhdhi wodhdhana.

English Sentences: Though thou, Israel, play the harlot, yet let not Judah offend; and come not ye unto Gilgal, neither go ye up to Bethaven, nor swear, The LORD liveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asatoo, intte shaaramuxa kiyikkokka, Yihudaa asai intteegaadan, mooranchcha gidoppo. Gelggala booppite; Beeti-Aweenikka pude kiyoppite; GODAI ero! yaagidi caaqqoppite.

English Sentences: For Israel slideth back as a backsliding heifer: now the LORD will feed them as a lamb in a large place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai makkalanchcha usseedan makkaliis. Yaatin, GODAI eta aaho dembban dorssa maratudan waatidi heemmanee?

English Sentences: Ephraim is joined to idols: let him alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai eeqatun gaittiis; eta aggiigite.

English Sentences: Their drink is sour: they have committed whoredom continually: her rulers with shame do love, Give ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti daro woiniyaa uyi simmidi, shaaramuxiyoogaa aggokkona; eta haariyaageetikka yeellayiyaabaa keehippe dosoosona.

English Sentences: The wind hath bound her up in her wings, and they shall be ashamed because of their sacrifices.
Wolaitta Sentences: Carkkoi eta efaana; bantta eeqau yarshshido yarshshotu gaasuwan eti yeellatana.

English Sentences: Hear ye this, O priests; and hearken, ye house of Israel; and give ye ear, O house of the king; for judgment is toward you, because ye have been a snare on Mizpah, and a net spread upon Tabor.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, qeesetoo, hagaa siyite! Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, ezggite! Kawuwaa keettaa asatoo, akeekite! Ha pirddai intte bolli pirddettiis. Intte Mixiphphan piredan hanideta; Taaboora Deriyaa bollikka miccido gitedan hanideta.

English Sentences: And the revolters are profound to make slaughter, though I have been a rebuker of them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Makkalanchchati woriya diizzadan hanidosona; hegaa gishshau, taani eta ubbaa qaxxayana.

English Sentences: I know Ephraim, and Israel is not hid from me: for now, O Ephraim, thou committest whoredom, and Israel is defiled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireemabaa taani erais; Israa7eelikka taappe geemmibeenna. Efireemaa, neeni ha77i shaaramuxa kiyadasa; Israa7eelikka tuniis" yaagees.

English Sentences: They will not frame their doings to turn unto their God: for the spirit of whoredoms is in the midst of them, and they have not known the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai bantta Xoossaakko simmennaadan, eta iita oosoi eta teqqiis; shaaramuxa ayyaanai eta giddon de7ees. Hegaa gishshau, eti GODAA erokkona.

English Sentences: And the pride of Israel doth testify to his face: therefore shall Israel and Ephraim fall in their iniquity; Judah also shall fall with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa otoroi eta bollan markkattees; hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela asainne Efireema asai bantta nagaran xubettoosona; Yihudaa asaikka etaara xubettees.

English Sentences: They shall go with their flocks and with their herds to seek the LORD; but they shall not find him; he hath withdrawn himself from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAASSI yarshshanau bantta dorssatu wudiyaanne mehiyaa wudiyaa laaggi ekkidi baana; shin eti a demmokkona. Aissi giikko, i etappe shaahettiichchiis.

English Sentences: They have dealt treacherously against the LORD: for they have begotten strange children: now shall a month devour them with their portions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAAYYO ammanettibookkona; eti yelido naatikka assa gidokkona. Hegaa gishshau, ha aginai xeeranaashin, etikka eta biittaikka xayana.

English Sentences: Blow ye the cornet in Gibeah, and the trumpet in Ramah: cry aloud at Bethaven, after thee, O Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gib77a kataman malkkataa, Raama kataman xurumbbaa punnite. "Biniyaama asau, nuuni intte guyyiyan de7oos; hegaa erite!" yaagidi, Beeti-Aweenan waasuwaa xulluusite.

English Sentences: Ephraim shall be desolate in the day of rebuke: among the tribes of Israel have I made known that which shall surely be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaxxayettiyo gallassi Efireemi baisa attana; Israa7eela zaretu giddon tumu hananabaa taani yootais.

English Sentences: The princes of Judah were like them that remove the bound: therefore I will pour out my wrath upon them like water.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Yihudaa halaqati zawaa sugiyaageetu mala gididosona; taani ta hanqquwaa eta bollan haattaadan gussana.

English Sentences: Ephraim is oppressed and broken in judgment, because he willingly walked after the commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai maaddanau danddayenna kawotettatuppe maaduwaa oichchanau qachchido gishshau, naaqettiisinne pirddan qohettiis.

English Sentences: Therefore will I be unto Ephraim as a moth, and to the house of Judah as rottenness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani Efireema asaayyo bil77a mala, Yihudaa asaayyookka quno mala.

English Sentences: When Ephraim saw his sickness, and Judah saw his wound, then went Ephraim to the Assyrian, and sent to king Jareb: yet could he not heal you, nor cure you of your wound.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireemi ba harggiyaa, Yihudaikka ba masunttaa be7ido wode, Efireemi Asoore biitti biis; biidi he biittaa haariya gita kawuwaa maaduwaa oichchiis. SHin i eta harggiyaa xallanau woikko eta masunttaa pattanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: For I will be unto Ephraim as a lion, and as a young lion to the house of Judah: I, even I, will tear and go away; I will take away, and none shall rescue him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani Efireemayyo gaammodan hanana; Yihudaayyookka wodala gaammodan hanana. Taani eta mentterettada, tookka ekkada baana; ooninne eta taappe wotti ekkenna.

English Sentences: I will go and return to my place, till they acknowledge their offence, and seek my face: in their affliction they will seek me early.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta mooruwaa akeekana gakkanaashiininne tana koyana gakkanaashin, taani guyye ta sohuwaa simmashshana. Eti bantta tuggau tana minttidi koyana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Come, and let us return unto the LORD: for he hath torn, and he will heal us; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai hagaadan yaagees; "Haayite! Ane GODAAKKO simmoos. I nuna mentterettiis, shin i nuna pattana; i nuna masunxxissiis, shin i nu masunttaa qachchana.

English Sentences: After two days will he revive us: in the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u gallassaappe guyyiyan, i nuna pattana; heezzantto gallassi nuuni a sinttan de7ana mala, i nuna denttana.

English Sentences: Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD: his going forth is prepared as the morning; and he shall come unto us as the rain, as the latter and former rain unto the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA ane eroos; a erana mala, minttidi ane a kaalloos. Awai mokkiyoogee tuma gidiyoogaadan, ikka tumu beettana. Badhdheesa iraadan, biittaa aliya balggo iraadan, i nuukko yaana" yaagees.

English Sentences: O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee? O Judah, what shall I do unto thee? for your goodness is as a morning cloud, and as the early dew it goeth away.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Efireema asau, taani inttena waatooshsha! Yihudaa asau, taani inttena waatooshsha! Aissi giikko, intte siiqoi maallado shaaraa mala; sohuwaara xayiya guuraa xaazaa mala.

English Sentences: Therefore have I hewed them by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments are as the light that goeth forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani hananabaa yootiyaageetu baggara inttena qanxxerettaas; ta doonaappe kiyida qaalan taani inttena woraas. Ta pirddaikka intte bolli poo7uwaadan pozhzhu gaana.

English Sentences: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice; and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani aggenna siiquwaa koyaisippe attin, yarshshuwaa koyikke; Xoossaa eriyoogaa koyaisippe attin, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa koyikke.

English Sentences: But they like men have transgressed the covenant: there have they dealt treacherously against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin eti Addaamedan, maachchaa kanttidosona; kanttidi yan taassi ammanettennan ixxidosona.

English Sentences: Gilead is a city of them that work iniquity, and is polluted with blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aade katamai iita oosuwaa oottiya asati de7iyo katama; he katamai asaa suuttan mooretti uttiis.

English Sentences: And as troops of robbers wait for a man, so the company of priests murder in the way by consent: for they commit lewdness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Panggati asa woranau qosetti uttidi naagiyoogaadan, qeesetu citaikka hegaadan naagees; naagidi Sekeema katamaa efiya ogiyan asaa worees. Ee, eti yeellayiya kobabaa oottoosona.

English Sentences: I have seen an horrible thing in the house of Israel: there is the whoredom of Ephraim, Israel is defiled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Israa7eela asan daganttiyaabaa be7aas. Efireema giddon shaaramuxatettai de7ees; Israa7eelikka tuniis.

English Sentences: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yihudaa biittaa asatoo, inttenakka qaxxayana gallassaa taani keera wottaas.

English Sentences: When I would have healed Israel, then the iniquity of Ephraim was discovered, and the wickedness of Samaria: for they commit falsehood; and the thief cometh in, and the troop of robbers spoileth without.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Israa7eela pattanaunne zaarettada ishalissanau koyiyo wode, Efireema nagarainne Samaariyaa asaa iita oosoi qoncci beettees. Aissi giikko, eti worddotoosona; kaisoti son keettaa mentti gelidi wuuqqoosona; panggatikka karen bonqqoosona.

English Sentences: And they consider not in their hearts that I remember all their wickedness: now their own doings have beset them about; they are before my face.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani eta iita oosuwaa ubbaa hassayiyoogaa eti akeekokkona. Eta iita oosoti eta dooddi wottidosona; he iita oosoti ubba wodekka ta sinttan de7oosona.

English Sentences: They make the king glad with their wickedness, and the princes with their lies.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti kawuwaa bantta iitatettan, halaqatakka bantta wordduwan ufaissoosona.

English Sentences: They are all adulterers, as an oven heated by the baker, who ceaseth from raising after he hath kneaded the dough, until it be leavened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka makkalanchcha; daabbuwaa uukkiyaagee coociyan eettido tamaadan, eti hanqquwan eexxi kiyoosona. He uukkiyaagee munaqqiyoogaa polidi, munaqai denddana gakkanaashin, tamaa eettenna.

English Sentences: In the day of our king the princes have made him sick with bottles of wine; he stretched out his hand with scorners.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu kawuwaa baalaa bonchchiyo gallassi, makkalanchchati halaqata woine eessan mattoyidi harggissidosona; uukkiyaagee ba kushiyaa denttidi, qilliicciyaageetussi malaatees.

English Sentences: For they have made ready their heart like an oven, whiles they lie in wait: their baker sleepeth all the night; in the morning it burneth as a flaming fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanai tama cooce mala; eti shiiqidi maqettidosona. Uukkiyaagee qamma ubbaa xiskkiiddi aqees; sa7ai wonttiyo wode tama lacodan, a hanqqoi eexxi kiyees.

English Sentences: They are all hot as an oven, and have devoured their judges; all their kings are fallen: there is none among them that calleth unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka tama coocedan michchoosona; michchidi banttana haariyaageeta moosona. Eta kawoti ubbaikka kunddidosona; etappe ooninne tana xeesiyaabi baawa.

English Sentences: Ephraim, he hath mixed himself among the people; Ephraim is a cake not turned.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireema asai hara kawotettatu asaara walahettiis; Efireema asai aatti yeggibeenna oittaa mala gidiis.

English Sentences: Strangers have devoured his strength, and he knoweth it not: yea, gray hairs are here and there upon him, yet he knoweth not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Allagati a wolqqaa miidosona, shin i hegaa eribeenna; a huupheekka puulummiis, shin i hegaa eribeenna.

English Sentences: And the pride of Israel testifieth to his face: and they do not return to the LORD their God, nor seek him for all this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa otoroi eta bollan markkattees. Hegee ubbai haninkka eti GODAAKKO, bantta Xoossaakko, simmibookkona woikko a koyibookkona.

English Sentences: Ephraim also is like a silly dove without heart: they call to Egypt, they go to Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireema asai qofi bainna eeyya haraphphe mala. Maaduwaa demmanau issiton Gibxxe xeesees; issiton qassi Asoorekko simmees.

English Sentences: When they shall go, I will spread my net upon them; I will bring them down as the fowls of the heaven; I will chastise them, as their congregation hath heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biyo wode, taani eta bollan gitiyaa yeggana; taani eta saluwaa kafotudan, duge goochchada wottana. Eta iita oosuwaa gishshau, taani eta qaxxayana.

English Sentences: Woe unto them! for they have fled from me: destruction unto them! because they have transgressed against me: though I have redeemed them, yet they have spoken lies against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Etau aayye7ana! Aissi giikko, eti taappe wora simmidosona. Eta bashshiyaabai yo! Aissi giikko, eti ta bolli makkalidosona. Taani eta wozanau koyaas; shin eti ta bolli wordduwaa haasayoosona.

English Sentences: And they have not cried unto me with their heart, when they howled upon their beds: they assemble themselves for corn and wine, and they rebel against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta hiixan zin77idi zilaaloosonappe attin, bantta wozanaappe tana woossokkona. Kattaassinne woine eessaassi bantta bollaa mashshan qanxxiiddi, hara xoossata woossoosona; shin eti ta bolli makkalidosona.

English Sentences: Though I have bound and strengthened their arms, yet do they imagine mischief against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani eta loohissaasinne minttaas; yaatinkka tau iitabaa maqettoosona.

English Sentences: They return, but not to the most High: they are like a deceitful bow: their princes shall fall by the sword for the rage of their tongue: this shall be their derision in the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti simmoosona, shin taakko simmokkona. Eti wora xonggiya wonddafiyaa mala. Eta halaqati iitabaa haasayiyoogaa daafan, bisuwan wurana; hegan eti Gibxxe asan qilliiccettana.

English Sentences: Set the trumpet to thy mouth. He shall come as an eagle against the house of the LORD, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Malkkataa punna! Aissi giikko, eti ta maachchaa kanttidi, ta higgiyaa menttido gishshau, GODAA asaa bolli morkkee argganttaadan aallanttees.

English Sentences: Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, Abeet nu Xoossau, nuuni Israa7eela asai nena eroos yaagidi taayyo waassoosona.

English Sentences: Israel hath cast off the thing that is good: the enemy shall pursue him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Israa7eela asai lo77obaa ixxido gishshau, morkkee eta yedettana.

English Sentences: They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew it not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti tana oichchennan banttau kawota kawoyidosona; taani yootennan de7ishin, halaqata dooridosona. Bantta xayuwau gaaso gidiya eeqa misileta bantta biraappenne worqqaappe medhdhidosona.

English Sentences: Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast thee off; mine anger is kindled against them: how long will it be ere they attain to innocency?
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa asau, mara milatissidi intte medhdhido eeqaa taani ixxaas; ta hanqqoi intte bolli eexxi kiyiis. Eti geeshsha gidennan aude gakkanaasshin daanee?

English Sentences: For from Israel was it also: the workman made it; therefore it is not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kushe hiillai a medhdhiisippe attin, i Xoossaa gidenna. Samaariyaa eeqa misilee meqerettana.

English Sentences: For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti carkkuwaa zeroosona; zeridi gotiyaa cakkoosona. Equwan de7iya eta kattau aifee baawa; hegaa gishshau, xiillee baawa; xiillee de7iyaakkokka allagati maana.

English Sentences: Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein is no pleasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai mitettiis; ha77i eti allaga asatu giddon de7oosona; eti meqqida miishshadan, pattenna asa gididosona.

English Sentences: For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti baddo harddiidai barkka yuuyiyoogaadan yuuyiiddi, Asoore biitti biidosona; Efireema asai bana maaddiya asa miishshan shammiis.

English Sentences: Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHammikkokka, taani eta shiishshana. Kare biittaa kawotinne halaqati eta huqqunnobare, eti sohuwaara hitana.

English Sentences: Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireema asai nagaraa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo daro sohota keexxiis; shin he yarshsho sohoti nagaraa oottiyo soho gididosona.

English Sentences: I have written to him the great things of my law, but they were counted as a strange thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etau ta higgiyan darobaa xaafaas; shin eti he higgiyaa allagabaadan xeellidosona.

English Sentences: They sacrifice flesh for the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat it; but the LORD accepteth them not; now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins: they shall return to Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yarshshanau dosoosona; yarshshuwaa ashuwaakka moosona; shin GODAI etan ufaittibeenna. I ha77i eta mooruwaa hassayana; qassi eta nagaraa gishshaukka eta qaxxayana; eti Gibxxe biitti baana.

English Sentences: For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai bana Medhdhidaagaa dogidi, kawo keettata keexxiis; Yihudaa asaikka gimbbettida daro katamata keexxiis. SHin taani he katamatun tamaa yeddana; yeddin eta qatota maana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Rejoice not, O Israel, for joy, as other people: for thou hast gone a whoring from thy God, thou hast loved a reward upon every cornfloor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asatoo, ufaittoppite! Hara kawotettatudan, poocu gooppite! Aissi giikko, intte intte Xoossaappe shaahettidi, shaaramuxideta; kattaa qoxxiyo aude ubban shaaramuxeessi immiyo waagaa dosideta.

English Sentences: The floor and the winepress shall not feed them, and the new wine shall fail in her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa daafan intte audiyaappe katta, woiniyaa gum77iyoosaappekka eessa demmekketa; qassi woiniyaa turaikka etau aifenna.

English Sentences: They shall not dwell in the LORD's land; but Ephraim shall return to Egypt, and they shall eat unclean things in Assyria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAA biittankka gam77okkona. SHin Efireemi Gibxxe biitti simmana; qassi Asoore biittan tuna qumaa maana.

English Sentences: They shall not offer wine offerings to the LORD, neither shall they be pleasing unto him: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the bread of mourners; all that eat thereof shall be polluted: for their bread for their soul shall not come into the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAASSI woiniyaa eessaa yarshshuwaa gussokkona; eta yarshshoikka a ufaissenna. He yarshshoi etau shochcha mala gidana; hegaa miya ubbai tunana. He oittai eti maanaassappe attin, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelenna.

English Sentences: What will ye do in the solemn day, and in the day of the feast of the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: Keerido baala gallassinne GODAA bonchchiyo baala gallassi, intte ai oottuuteetii?

English Sentences: For, lo, they are gone because of destruction: Egypt shall gather them up, Memphis shall bury them: the pleasant places for their silver, nettles shall possess them: thorns shall be in their tabernacles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bashshaappe kessi ekkikkokka, Gibxxee eta shiishshana; shiishshin Memppisa giyo katamai eta moogana. Eti shiishshido bira miishsha ubbai dooyee maayin attana; eta dunkkaaniyaa giddonkka buloi buuzoi mokkana.

English Sentences: The days of visitation are come, the days of recompence are come; Israel shall know it: the prophet is a fool, the spiritual man is mad, for the multitude of thine iniquity, and the great hatred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qixaatiyaa gallassai yiis; Xoossai asaayyo a oosuwaadan oosuwaadan zaariyo wodee gakkiis. Israa7eela asai hegaa ero! Intte iita nagaraa gishshaunne intte diina morkketettaa gishshau intte, "Hananabaa yootiyaageeti eeyya; ajjuutaa be7iyaageetikka gooyiyaageeta" yaagideta.

English Sentences: The watchman of Ephraim was with my God: but the prophet is a snare of a fowler in all his ways, and hatred in the house of his God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaagee ta Xoossaara issippe gididi, Efireema naagiyaagaa. SHin hemettiyo oge ubban Efireemayyo kafo oiqqiyoogaadan, piree wodhdhi uttiis; a Xoossaa keettankka morkketettai de7ees.

English Sentences: They have deeply corrupted themselves, as in the days of Gibeah: therefore he will remember their iniquity, he will visit their sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beni Gib77a kataman hanidoogaadan, eti keehi tunidosona. Xoossai eta mooruwaa hassayana; hassayidi eta nagaraa qaxxayana.

English Sentences: I found Israel like grapes in the wilderness; I saw your fathers as the firstripe in the fig tree at her first time: but they went to Baalpeor, and separated themselves unto that shame; and their abominations were according as they loved.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani Israa7eela asaa bazzon woine teeraa demmiyoogaadan demmaas. Taani intte aawata balasiyaa giyo mittan de7iya koiro aifiyaa be7iyoogaadan be7aas. SHin eti Ba7aali-Pa7oora giyoosaa yiidi, Ba7aala giyo eeqaassi goinnidosona; yaatidi bantta dosido eeqaadankka tunidosona.

English Sentences: As for Ephraim, their glory shall fly away like a bird, from the birth, and from the womb, and from the conception.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema bonchchoi kafodan paalli xayana; hagaappe sinttanau yeliyoobi baawa; abbe ixettiyoobi baawa; shahaariyoobi baawa.

English Sentences: Though they bring up their children, yet will I bereave them, that there shall not be a man left: yea, woe also to them when I depart from them!
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti naata yelidi dichchikkokka, issoinne attennan worarggada, eta yeloi bainna asa kessana. Taani etappe haakkido wode, etau aayye7ana.

English Sentences: Ephraim, as I saw Tyrus, is planted in a pleasant place: but Ephraim shall bring forth his children to the murderer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai omooduwau imettishin be7aas; Efireema asai bantta naata goora7iyaageetussi kessidi immanau koshshees" yaagees.

English Sentences: Give them, O LORD: what wilt thou give? give them a miscarrying womb and dry breasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, etau imma! Neeni etau ai immuutee? Neeni etau boshettiya uluwaanne melida xanttaa imma.

English Sentences: All their wickedness is in Gilgal: for there I hated them: for the wickedness of their doings I will drive them out of mine house, I will love them no more: all their princes are revolters.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Eta iitatetta ubbai Gelggala giyoosaana; taani eta ixxiyoogaa yan doommaas. Eta oosuwaa iitatettaa gishshau, taani eta ta keettaappe gooddana; hagaappe sinttanau taani eta siiqikke; eta haariyaageetikka makkalanchcha.

English Sentences: Ephraim is smitten, their root is dried up, they shall bear no fruit: yea, though they bring forth, yet will I slay even the beloved fruit of their womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai deshettin, eta xaphoi meliis; aifiyaakka aifokkona. Eti naata yelikkokka, taani eti siiqiyo naata worana" yaagees.

English Sentences: My God will cast them away, because they did not hearken unto him: and they shall be wanderers among the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta Xoossai giyoobaa siyenna gishshau, i eta pixiri olana; olin eti kawotettatu giddon toilattiyaageeta gidana.

English Sentences: Israel is an empty vine, he bringeth forth fruit unto himself: according to the multitude of his fruit he hath increased the altars; according to the goodness of his land they have made goodly images.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai daayida woine turaa mala; eti banttau aifiyaa aifoosona. Eti aifiyo aifee darido keenaa yarshshiyo sohota darissi keexxidosona. Eta biittai duretido keenaa, goinniyo eeqa tuussata alleeqissidi medhdhidosona.

English Sentences: Their heart is divided; now shall they be found faulty: he shall break down their altars, he shall spoil their images.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanan genee kumiis; ha77i eti bantta mooruwaa qixaatiyaa ekkanau koshshees. GODAI eti yarshshiyo sohota laalana; eta eeqa tuussata xaissana.

English Sentences: For now they shall say, We have no king, because we feared not the LORD; what then should a king do to us?
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode eti, "Nuuni GODAASSI yayyibeenna gishshau, nuussi kawoi baawa; shin nuussi woni kawoi de7iyaakkonne ai oottanee?" yaagana.

English Sentences: They have spoken words, swearing falsely in making a covenant: thus judgment springeth up as hemlock in the furrows of the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hekkennabaa haasayoosona; maachchaa maacettiiddikka wordduwan caaqqoosona. Hegaa gishshau, woriya sharafai shooqan doliyoogaadan, eta bollan pirddai dolana.

English Sentences: The inhabitants of Samaria shall fear because of the calves of Bethaven: for the people thereof shall mourn over it, and the priests thereof that rejoiced on it, for the glory thereof, because it is departed from it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa kataman de7iya asai Beeti-Aweenan de7iya maraa misiliyaayyo yayyoosona. A bonchchoi appe shaahettiichchido gishshau, asai au yeekkana; he eeqaa misiliyau oottiya qeesetikka waassana.

English Sentences: It shall be also carried unto Assyria for a present to king Jareb: Ephraim shall receive shame, and Israel shall be ashamed of his own counsel.
Wolaitta Sentences: He eeqa misilee Asoore biitti toohetti biidi, gita kawuwaassi giiradan imettana. Efireema asai yeellatana; Israa7eela asaikka ba eeqaa misiletu daafan kauyyana.

English Sentences: As for Samaria, her king is cut off as the foam upon the water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa kawoi haattaa bollan qaixaaree toohettiyoogaadan, toohetti xayana.

English Sentences: The high places also of Aven, the sin of Israel, shall be destroyed: the thorn and the thistle shall come up on their altars; and they shall say to the mountains, Cover us; and to the hills, Fall on us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Israa7eela asai Aweena giyo kataman eeqau goinnidi, nagaraa oottiyo xoqqa sohotikka qolettana; eti yarshshiyoosan agunttainne gom77oree mokkana. Yaatin, eti dereta, "Nuna genttite!" yaagana. Keratakka, "Nu bolli kunddite!" yaagana.

English Sentences: O Israel, thou hast sinned from the days of Gibeah: there they stood: the battle in Gibeah against the children of iniquity did not overtake them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eelatoo, intte Gib77an nagaraa oottido gallassaappe doommidi, nagaraa oottiyoogaa aggibeekketa. Hegaa gishshau, Gib77a kataman intte bolli olai denddana.

English Sentences: It is in my desire that I should chastise them; and the people shall be gathered against them, when they shall bind themselves in their two furrows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani koyiyo wode, he makkalanchchata qaxxayana. Eti oottido daro nagaraa gaasuwan taani eta qaxxayiyo wode, kawotettati eta bollan shiiqana.

English Sentences: And Ephraim is as an heifer that is taught, and loveth to tread out the corn; but I passed over upon her fair neck: I will make Ephraim to ride; Judah shall plow, and Jacob shall break his clods.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireemi kattaa yerettaa dosiya, wadhdhidi kessido mirggo mala; shin taani a puula morggiyan qambbaraa wottada waaxana. Yihudaa asai goyanau koshshees; Yaaqooba asaikka gadiyaa phalqqanau koshshees.

English Sentences: Sow to yourselves in righteousness, reap in mercy; break up your fallow ground: for it is time to seek the LORD, till he come and rain righteousness upon you.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI yiidi, xillotettaa intte bolli iraadan bukissana gakkanaashin, intte a koyiyo wode gidiyo gishshau, inttessi xillotettaa zerite; zeridi aggenna siiquwaa cakkite; otta biittaakka phalqqite.

English Sentences: Ye have plowed wickedness, ye have reaped iniquity; ye have eaten the fruit of lies: because thou didst trust in thy way, in the multitude of thy mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte iitatettaa zeridi, nagaraa cakkideta; intte wordduwaa aifiyaakka miideta. "Intte intte wolqqaaninne intte daro olanchchatun ammanettido gishshau,

English Sentences: Therefore shall a tumult arise among thy people, and all thy fortresses shall be spoiled, as Shalman spoiled Betharbel in the day of battle: the mother was dashed in pieces upon her children.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte asaa bolli olaa dirbbai denddana; denddidi beni olaa wode Kawoi SHalmmaani Beeti-Arbbeela katamaa olidi bashshidoogaadaaninne aayetuuranne naatuura gatto mentterettidoogaadan, intte qatoti hegaadan olin bayana.

English Sentences: So shall Bethel do unto you because of your great wickedness: in a morning shall the king of Israel utterly be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Beeteele katamaa asatoo, intte hanttaara iitatettaa daafan intte bollikka hagaa malabai gakkana. He gallassi sa7ai wonttiyo wode, Israa7eela kawoi muleera xayana.

English Sentences: When Israel was a child, then I loved him, and called my son out of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eeli naatettan de7iyo wode, taani a siiqaas; siiqada taani ta na7aa Gibxxe biittaappe xeesaas.

English Sentences: As they called them, so they went from them: they sacrificed unto Baalim, and burned incense to graven images.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta darissada xeesin, eti taappe daro haakkidi biidosona. Ba7aala geetettiya eeqatussi yarshshuwaa yarshshidosona; qassi eeqaa misiletussi ixaanaa cuwayidosona.

English Sentences: I taught Ephraim also to go, taking them by their arms; but they knew not that I healed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asaa haraqiyaa oiqqada hemetaa tamaarissidai tana; shin eta pattidaagee tana gidiyoogaa eti erokkona.

English Sentences: I drew them with cords of a man, with bands of love: and I was to them as they that take off the yoke on their jaws, and I laid meat unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta qaretaaninne siiquwaa wodoruwan goochchaas; eta morggiyaappe qambbaraa denttaas; denttada hokkada eta mizaas.

English Sentences: He shall not return into the land of Egypt, but the Assyrian shall be his king, because they refused to return.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti taakko simmennan ixxido gishshau, Gibxxe biitti simmana; qassi Asoore biittaa kawoi eta bolli kawotana.

English Sentences: And the sword shall abide on his cities, and shall consume his branches, and devour them, because of their own counsels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta morkkiyaa bisoi eta katamata olana. Eta katamatu penggetakka mentterettana; eta zoretaikka laalettana.

English Sentences: And my people are bent to backsliding from me: though they called them to the most High, none at all would exalt him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai taappe haakkidi baanau qofaa qachchiis. Huqqunnaa qambbaraa gaasuwan eti waassana; shin ooninne he qambbaraa eta morggiyaappe denttenna.

English Sentences: How shall I give thee up, Ephraim? how shall I deliver thee, Israel? how shall I make thee as Admah? how shall I set thee as Zeboim? mine heart is turned within me, my repentings are kindled together.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireemaa, taani nena waatada aggoo? Israa7eelaa, taani nena waatada aatta immoo? Taani nena waatada Adaama giyo katamaadan oottoo? Taani nena waatada Xaboima giyo katamaadan oottoo? Taani nena keehi siiqiyo gishshau, ta wozanai hegaa eenenna.

English Sentences: I will not execute the fierceness of mine anger, I will not return to destroy Ephraim: for I am God, and not man; the Holy One in the midst of thee: and I will not enter into the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta suulliya hanqquwan eta ainne oottikke; qassi Efireema naa77anttuwaa xaissikke. Aissi giikko, taani Xoossappe attin, asa gidikke. Taani Geeshsha Xoossai intte giddon de7ais; inttekko suulo hanqquwan yiikke.

English Sentences: They shall walk after the LORD: he shall roar like a lion: when he shall roar, then the children shall tremble from the west.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti GODAA kaallana; ikka gaammodan gudana. I gudiyo wode, a naati arggo baggappe yaana;

English Sentences: They shall tremble as a bird out of Egypt, and as a dove out of the land of Assyria: and I will place them in their houses, saith the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittaappe kafotudan, Asoore biittaappekka haraphphetudan, paalliiddi yaana. Yin taani eta eta keettan keettan wottana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: Ephraim compasseth me about with lies, and the house of Israel with deceit: but Judah yet ruleth with God, and is faithful with the saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai wordduwan, Israa7eela asaikka cimuwan tana dooddidosona. Yihudaa asaikka ammanttiya Geeshsha Xoossaa bolli xalttaamiis.

English Sentences: Ephraim feedeth on wind, and followeth after the east wind: he daily increaseth lies and desolation; and they do make a covenant with the Assyrians, and oil is carried into Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai maalladoppe omarssi gakkanaashin oottiyoobai ubbai, arshshoora yiya carkkuwaa kuucciyoogaa woikko yedettiyoogaa mala go77enna. Eti wordduwaanne makkala oosuwaa darissoosona; Asoore biittaara maachchaa maacettoosona; wogaraa zaitiyaa Gibxxe biitti yeddoosona.

English Sentences: The LORD hath also a controversy with Judah, and will punish Jacob according to his ways; according to his doings will he recompense him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO Yihudaa asaara mootoi de7ees; i Yaaqooba asaa eta ogiyaadan qaxxayana; eta oosuwaadankka au zaarana.

English Sentences: He took his brother by the heel in the womb, and by his strength he had power with God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi ba aayee uluwan de7iiddi, ba ishaa ginddiyaa oiqqiis. Qassi gamma gakkidi, Xoossaara baaxetiis;

English Sentences: Yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him in Bethel, and there he spake with us;
Wolaitta Sentences: kiitanchchaarakka baaxetidi xooniis. Bana keha aifiyan xeellanaadan, ba ishaa yeekkidi woossiis. Yaaqoobi Xoossaa Beeteelen demmiis; demmin Xoossai yan aara haasayiis.

English Sentences: Even the LORD God of hosts; the LORD is his memorial.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee GODAA, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossaa. I erettido sunttaikka GODAA geetettees.

English Sentences: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte Xoossaakko simmite; siiquwaanne suure pirddaa mintti oiqqite; intte Xoossai oottanaashin naagite.

English Sentences: He is a merchant, the balances of deceit are in his hand: he loveth to oppress.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zal77anchchaa kushiyan worddo meezaanai de7ees; asaa i cimmiyoogaa dosees.

English Sentences: And Ephraim said, Yet I am become rich, I have found me out substance: in all my labours they shall find none iniquity in me that were sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireemi, "Taani daro dure; taani taayyo aquwaa demmaas. Ta aquwaa ubbaa giddon tanan eti bala woikko nagara gidiyaabaa demmokkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I that am the LORD thy God from the land of Egypt will yet make thee to dwell in tabernacles, as in the days of the solemn feast.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessada ehiida GODAA intte Xoossaa; Daase Baalaa gallassaadan, taani inttena naa77anttuwaakka dunkkaaniyan wottana.

English Sentences: I have also spoken by the prophets, and I have multiplied visions, and used similitudes, by the ministry of the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hananabaa yootiyaageetussi haasayaas. Daro ajjuutaakka etau immaas; qassi eta baggaara daro leemisota yootaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: Is there iniquity in Gilead? surely they are vanity: they sacrifice bullocks in Gilgal; yea, their altars are as heaps in the furrows of the fields.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aaden nagarai de7ees; Gala7aade asati tumuppe pattennaageeta. Eti Gelggalan korimata yarshshoosona. Hegaa gishshau, eti yarshshiyoosati goshsha giddon keelido shuchcha mala gidana.

English Sentences: And Jacob fled into the country of Syria, and Israel served for a wife, and for a wife he kept sheep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Sooriyaa biitti baqatiis; maccaasa ekkanau keraa oottiis. Maccaasa ekkana gishshau, i yan dorssaa heemmiis.

English Sentences: And by a prophet the LORD brought Israel out of Egypt, and by a prophet was he preserved.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaa hananabaa yootiyaagaa baggaara Gibxxe biittaappe kessiis; kessidi he hananabaa yootiyaagaa baggaara eta naagiis.

English Sentences: Ephraim provoked him to anger most bitterly: therefore shall he leave his blood upon him, and his reproach shall his LORD return unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Efireemi GODAA keehi hanqqetissiis; suuttaa i gussidoogaa acuwaa a Godai a achchana; qassi a cashshaa au zaarana.

English Sentences: When Ephraim spake trembling, he exalted himself in Israel; but when he offended in Baal, he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai haasayido wode, siyida asai yashshau kokkoriis; Israa7eela biittan eti bonchchettida asa. SHin Ba7aala giyo eeqaayyo goinnidosona; he mooruwaa gaasuwan haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And now they sin more and more, and have made them molten images of their silver, and idols according to their own understanding, all of it the work of the craftsmen: they say of them, Let the men that sacrifice kiss the calves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka nagaraa bolli nagaraa oottoosona; qassi banttau goinnanau, seerissidi misileta medhdhoosona. He misileti hiillan biraappe merettidaageeta; eti ubbaikka kushe hiillai medhdhidoogeeta. Etabaa asai haasayiiddi, "Haa yiite; etayyo yarshshuwaa yarshshite; ha maraa misiliyaakka yerite" yaagees.

English Sentences: Therefore they shall be as the morning cloud, and as the early dew that passeth away, as the chaff that is driven with the whirlwind out of the floor, and as the smoke out of the chimney.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa daafan eti maallado shaaraa mala, woikko guuran qolettiya maallado xaazaa mala woikko carkkoi audiyaappe denttidi efiyo suulla mala woikko maskkootiyaara kiyiya cuwa mala gidana.

English Sentences: Yet I am the LORD thy God from the land of Egypt, and thou shalt know no god but me: for there is no saviour beside me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessada ehiida GODAA intte Xoossaa. Intte taappe attin, hara xoossa erekketa; ashshiyaageekka taappe attin, hari baawa.

English Sentences: I did know thee in the wilderness, in the land of great drought.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bazzuwan, mela biittan taani inttena naagaas.

English Sentences: According to their pasture, so were they filled; they were filled, and their heart was exalted; therefore have they forgotten me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena mizin, miidi kallideta; kallidi otorettideta; hegaappe guyyiyan, tana dogideta.

English Sentences: Therefore I will be unto them as a lion: as a leopard by the way will I observe them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani intte bolli gaammo mala gidana; qassi maahedan, ogiyaa doonan zuggana.

English Sentences: I will meet them as a bear that is bereaved of her whelps, and will rend the caul of their heart, and there will I devour them like a lion: the wild beast shall tear them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Marata wotti ekkido maaheedan, taani inttenaara gaittana; gaittada inttena daakerettana. Qassi taani inttena gaammodan yan maana; bazzo do7adan, inttena poosherettana.

English Sentences: O Israel, thou hast destroyed thyself; but in me is thine help.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asatoo, intte ta bolli, inttena maaddiyaagaa bolli morkketettan denddiyo gishshau, taani inttena xaissana.

English Sentences: I will be thy king: where is any other that may save thee in all thy cities? and thy judges of whom thou saidst, Give me a king and princes?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana, Nuussi kawonne deriyaa haariyaageeta imma yaagidi oichchideta. Inttena ashshanau intte kawoi anee? Intte deriyaa haariyaageeti intte katamatu giddon augan de7iyoonaa?

English Sentences: I gave thee a king in mine anger, and took him away in my wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta hanqquwan intteyyo kawuwaa immaas; immada ta yiilluwan a diggaas.

English Sentences: The iniquity of Ephraim is bound up; his sin is hid.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efireema mooroinne nagarai xaafettidi, mazggafa keettan uttiis.

English Sentences: The sorrows of a travailing woman shall come upon him: he is an unwise son; for he should not stay long in the place of the breaking forth of children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maareti oiqqido maccaasiyaa tuggatiyoogaa mala tuggai a bolli yaana. SHin i eri bainna na7a; aissi giikko, i yelettiyo wodee gakkin, ba aayee uluwaappe wodhdhennan ixxiya na7a mala.

English Sentences: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta taani duufuwaappe ashshana; haiquwaa wolqqaappekka wozana. Haiquwau, ne boshati awaanee? Duufuwau, ne bashshai awaanee? "Taani ta asaayyo qarettikke.

English Sentences: Though he be fruitful among his brethren, an east wind shall come, the wind of the LORD shall come up from the wilderness, and his spring shall become dry, and his fountain shall be dried up: he shall spoil the treasure of all pleasant vessels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireemi ba ishanttu giddon minnikkokka, GODAI yeddido arshsho bagga carkkoi bazzoppe carkkiiddi yaana. Yobare a pulttoti to77ana; a haatta ollatikka melana. Buquraa i minjjiyo keettatun de7iya al77o miishsha ubbai bonqqettana.

English Sentences: Samaria shall become desolate; for she hath rebelled against her God: they shall fall by the sword: their infants shall be dashed in pieces, and their women with child shall be ripped up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa asai bantta Xoossaa bolli makkalido gishshau, bantta mooruwaa qixaatiyaa ekkanau bessees. Eti bisuwan busakettana; eta guutta naatikka kinchchettana; eta shahaara maccaasatu uloikka phalqqettana" yaagees.

English Sentences: O Israel, return unto the LORD thy God; for thou hast fallen by thine iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asau, intte nagaraa gaasuwan xubettidi kunddideta. Intte ha77i GODAAKKO, intte Xoossaakko simmite.

English Sentences: Take with you words, and turn to the LORD: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously: so will we render the calves of our lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAKKO simmidi, hagaadan yaagidi woossite; "Nu nagara ubbaappe nuna maara; neeni nuna ne kehatettan shiishsha ekka; yaatin nuuni nu inxxarssan nena galatana.

English Sentences: Asshur shall not save us; we will not ride upon horses: neither will we say any more to the work of our hands, Ye are our gods: for in thee the fatherless findeth mercy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore biittai nuna ashshenna; nuuni olaa paratakka toggokko. Nuuni nu kushen medhdhido eeqa misileta mulekka, Hageeti nu xoossata gookko. Aawai bainnaageetussi qarettiyai nena" yaagite.

English Sentences: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Ta hanqqoi etappe simmiis; hegaa gishshau, taani eta makkala hanuwaappe eta pattana; pattada eta wozanappe siiqana.

English Sentences: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Israa7eela asaayyo xaaza mala gidana; eti ciishshaadan ciyyidi, Liibaanoosa zigaadan, xaphuwaa yeddana.

English Sentences: His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta yelaga marati daayana; wogaraadan eti lo77ana. Eta sawoikka Liibaanoosa zigaadan tonggu gaana.

English Sentences: They that dwell under his shadow shall return; they shall revive as the corn, and grow as the vine: the scent thereof shall be as the wine of Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai simmidi, ta kuwaa garssan de7ana; kattaa carshshaadan, eti salqqisalqqana; qassi eti woiniyaa turaadan ciyyana; Liibaanoosa woiniyaa eessaadan, deree eriyoobaa gidana.

English Sentences: Ephraim shall say, What have I to do any more with idols? I have heard him, and observed him: I am like a green fir tree. From me is thy fruit found.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe sinttan Efireema asai eeqa misileera gaittenna; taani intte woosaa siyananne inttena naagana. Taani irxxa zigaa mala; intteyyo anjjo ubbai taappe beettana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Who is wise, and he shall understand these things? prudent, and he shall know them? for the ways of the LORD are right, and the just shall walk in them: but the transgressors shall fall therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aadhdhida erai de7iyo ooninne hagaa akeeko; wozani de7iyo ooninne hagaa ero. GODAA ogee suure; xilloti he ogiyaara hemettoosona. SHin nagaranchchati an xubettoosona.
